statements.select:
SELECT IR_Adj_Id AS AdjId,IR_InvoiceNo AS InvoiceNo,IR_RevokeRemark AS RevokeRemark,IR_RGANo AS RgaNo,IR_DeliveryNo AS DeliveryNo,IR_ReasonCode AS ReasonCode,IR_ReasonCn AS ReasonCn,IR_ReasonEn AS ReasonEn,IR_Rev1 AS Rev1,IR_Rev2 AS Rev2,IR_Rev3 AS Rev3,IR_CreateUser AS CreateUser,IR_CreateUserName AS CreateUserName,IR_CreateDate AS CreateDate,IR_UpdateUser AS UpdateUser,IR_UpdateUserName AS UpdateUserName,IR_UpdateDate AS UpdateDate FROM InventoryReturnBsc
IR_Adj_Id = #value#

SELECT IR_Adj_Id AS AdjId,IR_InvoiceNo AS InvoiceNo,IR_RevokeRemark AS RevokeRemark,IR_RGANo AS RgaNo,IR_DeliveryNo AS DeliveryNo,IR_ReasonCode AS ReasonCode,IR_ReasonCn AS ReasonCn,IR_ReasonEn AS ReasonEn,IR_Rev1 AS Rev1,IR_Rev2 AS Rev2,IR_Rev3 AS Rev3,IR_CreateUser AS CreateUser,IR_CreateUserName AS CreateUserName,IR_CreateDate AS CreateDate,IR_UpdateUser AS UpdateUser,IR_UpdateUserName AS UpdateUserName,IR_UpdateDate AS UpdateDate FROM InventoryReturnBsc
IR_Adj_Id=#AdjId# IR_InvoiceNo=#InvoiceNo# IR_RevokeRemark=#RevokeRemark# IR_RGANo=#RgaNo# IR_DeliveryNo=#DeliveryNo# IR_ReasonCode=#ReasonCode# IR_ReasonCn=#ReasonCn# IR_ReasonEn=#ReasonEn# IR_Rev1=#Rev1# IR_Rev2=#Rev2# IR_Rev3=#Rev3# IR_CreateUserName=#CreateUserName# IR_UpdateUser=#UpdateUser# IR_UpdateUserName=#UpdateUserName# IR_UpdateDate=#UpdateDate#
statements.update: IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM InventoryReturnBsc WITH ( UPDLOCK, HOLDLOCK ) WHERE IR_Adj_Id = #AdjId#)) BEGIN INSERT INTO InventoryReturnBsc (IR_Adj_Id,IR_InvoiceNo,IR_RevokeRemark,IR_RGANo,IR_DeliveryNo,IR_ReasonCode,IR_ReasonCn,IR_ReasonEn,IR_Rev1,IR_Rev2,IR_Rev3,IR_CreateUser,IR_CreateUserName,IR_CreateDate,IR_UpdateUser,IR_UpdateUserName,IR_UpdateDate) VALUES(#AdjId#,#InvoiceNo#,#RevokeRemark#,#RgaNo#,#DeliveryNo#,#ReasonCode#,#ReasonCn#,#ReasonEn#,#Rev1#,#Rev2#,#Rev3#,#CreateUser#,#CreateUserName#,#CreateDate:DateTime:1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM#,#UpdateUser#,#UpdateUserName#,#UpdateDate:DateTime:1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM#) END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE InventoryReturnBsc SET IR_Adj_Id=#AdjId#,IR_InvoiceNo=#InvoiceNo#,IR_RevokeRemark=#RevokeRemark#,IR_RGANo=#RgaNo#,IR_DeliveryNo=#DeliveryNo#,IR_ReasonCode=#ReasonCode#,IR_ReasonCn=#ReasonCn#,IR_ReasonEn=#ReasonEn#,IR_Rev1=#Rev1#,IR_Rev2=#Rev2#,IR_Rev3=#Rev3#,IR_UpdateUser=#UpdateUser#,IR_UpdateUserName=#UpdateUserName#,IR_UpdateDate=#UpdateDate# WHERE IR_Adj_Id = #AdjId# END
